thread.title: BRIEF-Agricultural Bank Of China Receives Approval On Qualification Zhou Wanfu Of Co From CBIRC

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Agricultural Bank Of China Receives Approval On Qualification Zhou Wanfu Of Co From CBIRC

organizations.name: brief-agricultural bank of china receives approval on qualification zhou wanfu of co from cbirc

text:
April 12 (Reuters) - Agricultural Bank Of China Ltd :
* ZHOU WANFU WAS APPOINTED AS SECRETARY TO BOARD, COMPANY SECRETARY AND AN AUTHORISED REPRESENTATIVE OF BANK
* ZHANG KEQIU WILL NO LONGER SERVE AS BANKâ€™S SECRETARY TO BOARD, COMPANY SECRETARY AND AUTHORISED REPRESENTATIVE
* RECEIVED APPROVAL ON QUALIFICATION ZHOU WANFU OF AGRICULTURAL BANK OF CHINA LIMITED FROM CBIRC Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
